testcase.classname: Loops and conditions.similiar to WHILE loopTest
testcase.name: For-Loop-Exiting

testcase.classname: Loops and conditions.similiar to WHILE loopTest
testcase.name: For-Loop-in-Range-Exiting

property.name: Documentation
property.value: Robot Framework does not have a while loop. You must use FOR-loop and "exit for loop if" keyword to exit. It will run a finite times, but if you select large enough number in range, it is close enough for practical purposes.
